title: 旅程的尽头：故事模式第八章即将到来！
author: 六月奈
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Zero_Exact 于 2016-9-8 00:22 编辑 




Posted on Sep 7, 2016 by Marsh Davies
Marsh Davies发表于2016年9月7日

Are you sitting down? I’ve got good news and bad news. The good news is that Story Mode Episode 8 is almost here! It’s due to roll out on September 13th for PC, Mac and consoles. Hooray! The bad news is that this thrilling caper represents the very final instalment of the three-part DLC adventure. I know, I know. Do you need to be held? I’ve heard that breathing into a paper bag helps.

你现在是安心坐着的吗？我有好消息和坏消息。好消息就是故事模式第八章已经非常近了！它将在9月13日在PC、MAC、和主机平台上发布，万岁！坏消息是这惊险的跳跃将会是三部分DLC冒险章节的最后一部分。我知道，我知道。你需要冷静一下吗？在纸袋里呼吸一下会对你有帮助。

But if Jesse and the gang’s tale is coming to a conclusion, then it’s certainly not going out quietly. Having survived supernatural storms, maniacs in mansions, malevolent intelligence and more, Jesse’s crew have one last and potentially lethal trial before they can find their way back through the Portal Corridor. In their haste to obtain the Atlas, our heroes find themselves stumbling into the midst of a deadly tournament, in which people are forced to Spleef for their very lives, or else find themselves cracking quartz in the mines.

但是如果杰西和团队的故事即将告一段落，那么它肯定不会这么悄悄的发行。杰西的船员们在回到传送回廊前经历了最后一次的极为危险的磨难。在他们匆忙达到阿特拉斯时，我们的英雄发现他们自己陷入一种致命的比赛中，被迫为了生存下去而掘一死战，否则就得在矿井里挖掘石英。

What strange rules define The Games? Who are the mysterious trio who run them? Will Jesse and co even make it to the finish line alive? All these questions and more will be answered when you play the episode on the 13th - available to download individually for $4.99 or as part of the $14.99 Adventure Pass which gives you access to all three episodes of our DLC mini-season.
什么奇怪规则的游戏？谁是神秘的三人小组？谁运作着他们？杰西能否活着到达终点线？所有的问题将会在13号你体验这个章节时被逐一回答。可以单独花费4.99美元下载或者作为14.99美元可供访问我们的DLC小季中所有三个章节冒险包的一部分。

Cheerio!
下次再见！

来源地址：http://www.mojang.com/category/minecraft/
